channel.title: Easy Question
channel.description:
How would i make it so when I log in it says
"Owner and coder "myusernamehere" has logged in.
Or something like that.
The base is delta..
Thanks

item.title: Easy Question
item.dc:creator: @thomas27 thomas27
item.description:
@thomas27 wrote:

Is it already there?
Like:
“Owner and coder {name} has logged in”?

Cuz then just search it and edit it

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("urname")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner & Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("no one")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Co-owner " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner or co-owner:" +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 4) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner: " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Player " +playerName+ " has logged in"; }

Read full topic
